div.p: What is the best book you've ever read and why?
The best book for me that's,of course, "The portrait of Dorian Grey", not only I have this name and also because it shows the art which presente the live.

The live is eternel, not its imitation. In this sense I atempt to leave as a work of art. But, it is claire, the art of beauty it's always not the beaty of soul or spirit. The harmonie is a ideal, but not real, sorry.
Hellas, my live is like Dorian Grey.
The beaty of Dorian Grey is eternel, but his spirit and soul are died.
